headline: SmartestEnergy Engages Cognizant to Strengthen Its Cyber Security and Help Safeguard Its Business
summary: Cognizant (Nasdaq: CTSH) today announced a new collaboration with SmartestEnergy, the energy company helping Britain's businesses navigate the energy transition, aimed at bolstering SmartestEnergy's security posture and facilitating the continuous protection of its IT landscape.
